releaseNotes:
Noty v1.8 - UI Modernization Update

• Redesigned Todo Editor: Completely revamped Todo editing dialog with a more modern, intuitive interface
• Enhanced Visual Design: Updated color scheme with better contrast and readability
• Improved Interaction: Larger, more accessible buttons with clear visual hierarchy
• Better Organization: Added clear section headers and improved spacing
• Enhanced Typography: Consistent text sizes and styles for better readability
• Optimized Layout: Expanded dialog width and better use of screen space
• Visual Consistency: Better alignment with the main app's design language
• User Experience: More intuitive flow through form elements
